name: Chicken Egg Noodle Stir-Fry (Pad Mee Luang)
description: Easy chicken egg noodle stir-fry recipe, or pad mee luang, perfect for the family!
recipeIngredient: 7 ounces chicken (thinly sliced, breast or thighs)

recipeInstructions.text: If you're using frozen noodles, first thaw them in the fridge, then briefly blanch in boiling water for about 30 seconds to a minute, followed by a quick rinse under cold water to prevent further cooking. For dried egg noodles, cook them in boiling water according to the package's instructions until al dente, usually around 4–5 minutes, then drain and rinse under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: If you're using frozen noodles, first thaw them in the fridge, then briefly blanch in boiling water for about 30 seconds to a minute, followed by a quick rinse under cold water to prevent further cooking. For dried egg noodles, cook them in boiling water according to the package's instructions until al dente, usually around 4–5 minutes, then drain and rinse under cold water.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oil in your wok and then sauté garlic until golden and fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oil in your wok and then sauté garlic until golden and fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Add your sliced chicken and cook until it's nearly done.
recipeInstructions.name: Add your sliced chicken and cook until it's nearly done.

recipeInstructions.text: Add light soy and oyster sauce, white pepper, and white sugar along with your vegetables. Mix everything thoroughly and cook until the vegetables are soft to your liking.
recipeInstructions.name: Add light soy and oyster sauce, white pepper, and white sugar along with your vegetables. Mix everything thoroughly and cook until the vegetables are soft to your liking.

recipeInstructions.text: Lastly, add your egg noodles and gently mix them with the ingredients in your pan. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Lastly, add your egg noodles and gently mix them with the ingredients in your pan. Serve immediately and enjoy!

keywords: chicken egg noodle, egg noodle stir-fry, pad mee luang, thai egg noodle recipe
